sources.title: Once Upon a Dream
sources.description: Title: Once Upon a Dream Summary: Chaos ensues when a woman wakes up believing that a romantic dream about her new servant is reality. Directed by: Ralph Thomas Actors: Googie Withers, Griffith Jones, Guy Middleton Production Company: Triton Productions Release Date: February 1949 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Chaos ensues when a woman wakes up believing that a romantic dream about her new servant is reality.

metadata.Plot: Romantic comedy, set in the aftermath of World War II. Major Gilbert is discharged from the army and returns home to his wife. He feels exhausted, and consequently has little interaction with her before going to bed. The Major has brought with him Jackson, his batman from the army. He has decided to hire Jackson as his new butler. Carol Gilbert, the Major's wife, has a crush on Jackson. At night, she has a romantic dream about Jackson. She wakes the next morning convinced that the dream was true, and does not understand why Jackson does not treat her as a loved one.
metadata.Writer: Val Guest, Victor Katona, Patrick Kirwan
metadata.Actors: Googie Withers, Griffith Jones, Guy Middleton
